con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="REST Service"/> <resources base="http://localhost:8084"> <resource path="login" id="Login"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Login"/> <param name="username" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="password" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="hasAttachment" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="Login"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Login"/> <request> <param default="Login" name="username" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param default="Login123" name="password" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param default="" name="hasAttachment" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="0"> <representation mediaType=""/> <representation required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="hasAttachment" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="buy" id="buy"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="buy"/> <param name="sessionid" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="buystring" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="Buy"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Buy"/> <request> <param name="sessionid" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param default="Item 1" name="buystring" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> </method> </resource> <resource path="logout" id="logout"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="logout"/> <param name="sessionid" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="Logout"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Logout"/> <request> <param default="1234" name="sessionid" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType=""/> <representation mediaType=""/> <representation mediaType=""/> required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="searchstring" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="Search"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Search"/> <request> <param name="sessionid" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param default="Item 1" name="searchstring" type="xs:string" required="false" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="0"> <representation mediaType=""/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources>
